channel.title: [Delta] Making a new points system that saves?
channel.description: Well, if whoever helped me coded a Delta source before.. They would probably know how a points system works. Eg. Pest control, assault etc. Well I want to make my own points system, how? Also, don't tell me that I need to put something in a 'more info' file, because I looked through and Delta doesn't have one.

item.title: [Delta] Making a new points system that saves?
item.dc:creator: @davedave davedave
item.description:
@davedave wrote:

Well, if whoever helped me coded a Delta source before… They would probably know how a points system works. Eg. Pest control, assault etc. Well I want to make my own points system, how?
Also, don’t tell me that I need to put something in a ‘more info’ file, because I looked through and Delta doesn’t have one.

Read full topic
item.source: [Delta] Making a new points system that saves?
